= 3 Steps to use gwt-tagcloud=

 * Add the [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-tagcloud/downloads/list tagcloud_xxx.jar]  file to your project _( war/WEB_INF/lib/tagcloud_xxx.jar )_

 * Add it to your build path _( right click > Build Path > Add to Build Path )_

 * Add the following line to your project xml description file _( *.gwt.xml )_ : 
{{{
    <inherits name="gdurelle.tagcloud.TagCloud"/>
}}}

That's it !
